ComicInfo.Summary:
Emotional Ebola - Part Two: The Red Hook fights a carnival fat man.
Chase the Lady, Chapter 13: Rachel is suffering.
The Rheingold: Aleksandra tells of murdering a man on a train and how an old woman sleuth put her in danger.
Brooklyn Blood, Chapter 13: O'Connor and Hasan are attacked by an Old One that the criminal has been sacrificing people to.
Death Rides a Bullet: Chapter 05: The Black Sinister is in Hell.
Kara Böcek, Chapter 3: The Black Beetle's room is searched.
ComicInfo.Tags: Nadira Hasan,Hell,Istanbul,Black Beetle,The Black Sinister,Billy O’Connor
